name: Task Summary
query:
SELECT
 name AS "Name",
 subject AS "Subject",
 project AS "Project",
 exp_start_date AS "Expected Start Date",
 exp_end_date AS "Expected End Date",
 status AS "Status",
 progress AS "Progress",
 priority AS "Priority",
 is_milestone AS "Is Milestone",
 parent_task AS "Parent Task",
 completed_by AS "Completed By",
 completed_on AS "Completed On"
FROM
 `tabTask`
WHERE
 status NOT IN ("Cancelled", "Template")
AND project = %(project)s
AND is_milestone = %(is_milestone)s
